alert.note: Alert for Ponce (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 26 at 6:22PM ADT until August 26 at 7:30PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Ponce County in Puerto Rico... * Until 630 PM AST. * At 522 PM AST, emergency managers, as well as sensors from USGS indicated that Rio Inabon was at flood stage. Road PR-511 has to be closed due to ongoing flooding. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
